item.description:
www.Bostonareia.com

Joe Craft, CPA will discuss the top 10 mistakes even your tax professional can make!

It’s your money!!

So no one is going to watch it like you will!!

You don’t have to know every detail of how your accountant does your taxes but you know what they say: You don’t know what you don’t know.

So come and find out!

It may change your investing life!

Joe Craft will speak about the tax implications of real estate investing. He will cover topics such as:

How to exclude the gain on a rental property
How to know when you are keeping the property too long
How to own real estate and maximize tax benefits;
Tax advantages of seeking investor status in real estate transactions;
Dealer status and how it is taxed differently; and,
Using cost-segregation to lower your tax liability.
Do you sell the building, or the entity that holds the building? Which is better for you?
When to plan for higher capital gains tax rates
Be careful how you limit risk – it can cost you
How to treat your business like a business
Tax ramifications of options – both buying and selling
Can you take 100% depreciation on that office furniture – (hint: when you can write off the whole amount NOW)
Land improvements and why they are not land, and not a building, and why you care
And lots more!!

Joe gives real-world information that you can use today, to keep more in your pocket.

Learn why it’s not what you make that matters, its what you keep that matters most.

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: LOTS OF TAX CHANGES IN 2011 - ARE YOU PREPARED?
